description.lang: This product is mains powered and used to control an externally connected lighting load (up to 600W). The device features a single rocker on the front for controlling the state of the load. It is also possible to associate other devices with the rocker1 GANG 600W DIMMER MODULE1 Gang 600W Dimmer, 868.1MHz, Malaysia RF Range up to 75m (open field)Can control up to 5 devicesCan control either a group or a scenePre programmed with HOLIDAY MODE functionMains powered
